biocontainers.name: maqview
biocontainers.summary: Graphical read alignment viewer. it is specifically designed for the maq alignment file and allows visualization of the mismatches, base qualities and mapping qualities. maqview is nothing fancy as consed or gap, but just a simple viewer for visualizing what happens in a particular region.

biotools.summary: Graphical read alignment viewer. It is specifically designed for the Maq alignment file and allows visualization of the mismatches, base qualities and mapping qualities. Maqview is nothing fancy as Consed or GAP, but just a simple viewer for visualizing what happens in a particular region.
